name: Library
game_info: +1 Science for every 2 Citizens in this City.
strategy: The Library increases the Science output of the city, speeding up the civ's acquisition of new technology.
historical_info: A library is a building housing a collection of books, scrolls, and other written material. Historically, books have been fairly expensive, often beyond the reach of a civilization's poorer classes. The library allows the poor access to the same knowledge as the rich, greatly improving their chances of success and advancement.
